abstract: Sarah Maslin Nir Nocturnalist column; Bill White, former president of Intrepid Sea, Air and Space Museum and Bryan Eure, who insures commercial real estate, celebrate their wedding with 670 of New York City's mega-wealthy and ultrapowerful; gala event is coordinated to draw attention to legalizing same-sex marriage.
snippet: Bill White and Bryan Eure may not have household names, but the guest list at their extravagant wedding on Sunday was impressive.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: Bill White and Bryan Eure may not have household names, but the guest list at their extravagant wedding on Sunday was impressive.

headline.main: The Wedding as Spectacle, Bearing a Message
headline.print_headline: The Wedding As Spectacle, Bearing A Message
headline.seo: Wedding of Bill White and Bryan Eure — Nocturnalist
